title: Russia launches what Ukraine is calling the biggest aerial barrage of the war
description: Russia launched 122 missiles and 36 drones against Ukrainian targets, officials said Friday, killing at least 18 civilians across the country.

title: The world's population was up 75 million this year, will stand at 8 billion on Jan. 1
description: The growth rate for the U.S. in the past year was 0.53%, about half the worldwide rate. The U.S. added 1.7 million people and will have a population on New Year's Day of 335.8 million people.
